TypeSignature.Value: public struct ValueTuple<T1> : IComparable, IComparable<ValueTuple<T1>>, IEquatable<ValueTuple<T1>>, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValueTuple`1<T1> extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable, class System.IComparable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple`1<!T1>>, class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.ValueTuple`1<!T1>>
Public Structure ValueTuple(Of T1) Implements IComparable, IComparable(Of ValueTuple(Of T1)), IEquatable(Of ValueTuple(Of T1)), IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1> public value class ValueTuple : IComparable, IComparable<ValueTuple<T1>>, IEquatable<ValueTuple<T1>>, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

typeparam.span: 值元組唯一元素的類型。

span.span: The type of the value tuple's only element.

summary.span: 表示含有單一元件的值元組。

span.span: Represents a value tuple with a single component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值 tuple 是具有特定數量和值序列的資料結構。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 結構代表都有一個元素的值 tuple。The structure represents a value tuple that has one element. 與 tuple 類型不同的值 tuple 的類型 (例如，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as as follows: - 它們是結構 （實值類型），而不是類別 （參考型別）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 其成員是欄位，而不是屬性。Its member is a field rather than a property. - 其欄位是可變動而不是唯讀狀態。Its field is mutable rather than read-only. 值 tuple 的類型提供支援的執行階段實作[C# 中的 tuple](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)和結構在 F # 中的 tuple。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 除了建立執行個體所使用的語言語法，您可以呼叫factory 方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值的 tupleSerialization and value tuples 類型不是可序列化的.NET Core 1.x 或.NET Framework 4.7 和更早版本中。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET 標準，包括標準的.NET 2.0，不會要求的序列化執行個體; 是否是可序列化的執行個體取決於個別的.NET 標準實作。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要判斷是否型別可序列化特定的.NET 實作、 取得物件，代表類型及擷取的值其屬性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 如需可序列化的型別.NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的清單，請參閱[二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`引數會視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是實值類型。It is a value type. - 元件是與目前執行個體相同的類型。It component is of the same types as that of the current instance. - 其元件是等於目前的執行個體。Its component is equal to that of the current instance. 元件的預設相等比較子來判斷相等。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for the component.
